column1: ==Flying the Ring to Mount Doom==
Many skeptical readers have wondered why the Eagles simply didnt carry Frodo and the One Ring into Mordor and drop the Ring in Mount Doom
column2: or at least aid the Fellowship at some part of the journey
column3: such as helping them avoiding the Redhorn Gate and Moria.

column1: At first glance this seems incredibly easy compared to what actually happened (and it would have made a boring book).
The party of Tolkienists that accepts this as a wikipedia:plot hole usually respond that in any book there are usually plot holes. In a larger
column2: far more detailed and realistic book we expect fewer (if any) plot holes
column3: when in reality there is a far greater chance.

column3: guard it

It seems that nobody noticed this alleged plot-hole during Tolkiens lifetime
